trans-unit.source: Windows Team configuration policy settings| Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Windows Team configuration policy settings| Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: Use the Microsoft Intune **Windows 10 Team general configuration policy** to configure settings for enrolled Windows 10 Team devices such as the Microsoft Surface Hub.
trans-unit.target: Use the Microsoft Intune **Windows 10 Team general configuration policy** to configure settings for enrolled Windows 10 Team devices such as the Microsoft Surface Hub.

trans-unit.source: Windows Team configuration policy settings in Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Windows Team configuration policy settings in Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: Use the Microsoft Intune **Windows 10 Team general configuration policy** to configure settings for enrolled Windows 10 Team devices such as the Microsoft Surface Hub.
trans-unit.target: Use the Microsoft Intune **Windows 10 Team general configuration policy** to configure settings for enrolled Windows 10 Team devices such as the Microsoft Surface Hub.

trans-unit.source: Setting name
trans-unit.target: Setting name

trans-unit.source: Details
trans-unit.target: Details

trans-unit.source: Allow screen to wake automatically when someone in the room
trans-unit.target: Allow screen to wake automatically when someone in the room

trans-unit.source: Allows the device to wake automatically when its sensor detects someone in the room.
trans-unit.target: Allows the device to wake automatically when its sensor detects someone in the room.

trans-unit.source: Require PIN for wireless projection
trans-unit.target: Require PIN for wireless projection

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether you must enter a PIN before you can use the wireless projection capabilities of the device.
trans-unit.target: Specifies whether you must enter a PIN before you can use the wireless projection capabilities of the device.

trans-unit.source: Set a maintenance window for device updates
trans-unit.target: Set a maintenance window for device updates

trans-unit.source: Configures the window when updates can take place to the device.
trans-unit.target: Configures the window when updates can take place to the device.

trans-unit.source: You can configure the start time of the window and the duration (from 1-5 hours).
trans-unit.target: You can configure the start time of the window and the duration (from 1-5 hours).

trans-unit.source: Enable Azure Operational Insights
trans-unit.target: Enable Azure Operational Insights

trans-unit.source: Azure Operational Insights , part of the Microsoft Operations Manager suite collects, stores, and analyzes log file data from Windows 10 Team devices.
trans-unit.target: Azure Operational Insights , part of the Microsoft Operations Manager suite collects, stores, and analyzes log file data from Windows 10 Team devices.

trans-unit.source: To connect to Azure Operational insights, you must specify a **Workspace ID** and a **Workspace Key**.
trans-unit.target: To connect to Azure Operational insights, you must specify a **Workspace ID** and a **Workspace Key**.

trans-unit.source: Enable Miracast wireless projection
trans-unit.target: Enable Miracast wireless projection

trans-unit.source: Enable this option if you want to let the Windows 10 Team device use Miracast enabled devices to project.
trans-unit.target: Enable this option if you want to let the Windows 10 Team device use Miracast enabled devices to project.

trans-unit.source: If you enable this option, from **Choose Miracast channel** select the Miracast channel used to project content.
trans-unit.target: If you enable this option, from **Choose Miracast channel** select the Miracast channel used to project content.

trans-unit.source: Choose the meeting information displayed on the welcome screen
trans-unit.target: Choose the meeting information displayed on the welcome screen

trans-unit.source: If you enable this option, you can choose the information that will be displayed on the **Meetings** tile of the **Welcome** screen.
trans-unit.target: If you enable this option, you can choose the information that will be displayed on the **Meetings** tile of the **Welcome** screen.

trans-unit.source: You can:
trans-unit.target: You can:

trans-unit.source: Show organizer and time only
trans-unit.target: Show organizer and time only

trans-unit.source: Show organizer, time and subject (subject hidden for private meetings)
trans-unit.target: Show organizer, time and subject (subject hidden for private meetings)

trans-unit.source: Lockscreen background image URL
trans-unit.target: Lockscreen background image URL

trans-unit.source: Enable this setting to display a custom background on the **Welcome** screen of Windows 10 Team devices from the URL you specify.
trans-unit.target: Enable this setting to display a custom background on the **Welcome** screen of Windows 10 Team devices from the URL you specify.

trans-unit.source: The image must be in PNG format and the URL must begin with **https://**.
trans-unit.target: The image must be in PNG format and the URL must begin with **https://**.

trans-unit.source: See also
trans-unit.target: See also

trans-unit.source: Manage settings and features on your devices with Microsoft Intune policies
trans-unit.target: Manage settings and features on your devices with Microsoft Intune policies
